title: Weights not downloaded. Permission denied. Then training throws errors "TypeError: can't set attributes of built-in/extension type 'object' " when calling train_network()
body:
**Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version**

Ubuntu 16.04.5 LTS (GNU/Linux 4.4.0-142-generic x86_64), no virtual environment,
TensorFlow/1.12.0
DeepLabCut/2.0.4
Python/3.6.6

**Describe the problem**

I am running DLC on a server. I do not have root access. I can not label on the server but have labeled my set locally. I then created a project with the same movie on the server, and copy pasted the labeled data folder.

I then called
deeplabcut.create_training_dataset(config_path, num_shuffles=1)
This threw no errors.

Then I called
deeplabcut.train_network(config_path, shuffle=1)

This throws the following error:
TypeError: can't set attributes of built-in/extension type 'object'

In this thread https://github.com/AlexEMG/DeepLabCut/issues/178 the poster solved it by changing something in his python library. 

**How to Reproduce the problem**

I do not know if this has to do with the server or something else. I have followed the steps in the manual exactly, disregarding the fact that I had to label it locally, then upload it to the server. I then ran deeplabcut.create_training_dataset(config_path, num_shuffles=1) and then deeplabcut.train_network(config_path, shuffle=1)
